page.title: 03ONGAR LIBRARY
page.content: The library is next to the{Budworth {Hall,}though not actually on the main road. Although the library is small it has a fair selection of children's and adults' fact and fiction books. It is adjoined to the old infant school, which has been closed. The library is open on{Saturday and {Tuesday from 9am-5pm , Thursday from {10am-1pm , and Friday from 9am-8pm. The library will reserve books, and you can renew books by telephone as well. Ongar library works in co-operation with the project library in{Harlow.
